findings.title: BC - Blacklists Addresses
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to massively stop addresses from transactions.

findings.title: CR - Code Repetition
findings.description: The contract contains repetitive code segments.

findings.title: MVN - Misleading Variables Naming
findings.description: Variables can have misleading names if their names do not accurately reflect the value they contain or the purpose they serve.

findings.title: PVC - Price Volatility Concern
findings.description: The contract accumulates tokens from the taxes to swap them for ETH, which can lead to price volatility concerns.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases unnecessarily the gas consumption.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: An unused state variable is a state variable that is declared in the contract but is never used.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are not properly implemented and arithmetic operations may be missing.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract has dead code that is never executed or reached during normal contract execution.

findings.title: L12 - Using Variables before Declaration
findings.description: The contract is using variables before their declaration.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Local variables are not initialized before use, leading to unpredictable behavior and potential errors.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Local variables with the same name as variables in an outer scope are declared within a function or code block.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables are not properly validated before use, leading to potential errors and unexpected behavior.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: Using assembly can be error-prone and difficult to read and understand.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The compiler version is not locked, which can lead to unexpected behavior and undiscovered bugs.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The contract does not check if the result of transfer methods is successful.
